WidgetInfo.Description: This widget opens a panel in the TaskPane and allows the user to digitize features that can be downloaded as a GML file or uploaded to restore previously digitized features.
WidgetInfo.Label: Redline

Parameter.Name: Target
Parameter.Label: Target
Parameter.Description: The frame, window, or TaskPane in which to display any UI for the widget. If empty, a new window is used

Parameter.Name: PromptForRedlineLabels
Parameter.Description: Indicates whether to prompt the user for label input when recording redlines. Default is false
Parameter.Label: PromptForRedlineLabels

Parameter.Name: AutogenerateLayerNames
Parameter.Description: Indicates whether to prompt the auto-generate redline layer names when creating a new redline layer or to prompt the user. Default is true (don't prompt)
Parameter.Label: AutogenerateLayerNames

Parameter.Name: UseMapMessage
Parameter.Description: Indicates to use the map message bar for digitization prompts. Default is true
Parameter.Label: UseMapMessage
